fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may select a player and then target another, if the second target player has a killing ability, the first gains 1 use of Dayvig’s ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only give out two Dayvig abilities per game, and may not select the same killer twice.
- If Scientists spawn, you can’t spawn. Vice versa.
- Up to three Research personnel may
be in a game at once.
